text: Jakub Grič (born 5 July 1996) is a Slovak professional footballer who plays for Spartak Trnava in the Fortuna Liga as a midfielder. ==Club career== ===Zemplín Michalovce=== Grič won the 2014–15 DOXXbet liga with Zemplín Michalovce, earning the club its first promotion to the top tier of Slovak football. He made his Fortuna Liga debut for Michalovce in the starting line- up against AS Trenčín, on 18 July 2015.MFK Zemplín Michalovce – AS Trenčín 18.07.2015, onlajny.eu ===Spartak Trnava=== In July 2020, Grič had signed with Spartak Trnava, citing contention at signing with a club, with a notable name at home and abroad. Grič was of interest for Spartak on the grounds of his past performances and usefulness on different defensive positions. ==References== ==External links== * MFK Zemplín Michalovce official profile * Futbalnet profile * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Prešov Category:Slovak footballers Category:Slovak expatriate footballers Category:Slovakia youth international footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:MFK Zemplín Michalovce players Category:Sandecja Nowy Sącz players Category:FC Spartak Trnava players Category:2. title: Jakub Grič
